title: Graph Operations - Things + Relationships
description: Phase 11: Implement graph operations for Things and Relationships. This enables storing entities with EntityId (ns/type/id) URLs and creating relationships between them with efficient traversal.
close_reason: All Graph Operations (Things + Relationships) implemented - 72 tests passing

title: [RED] Thing.create() with EntityId (ns/type/id)
description: Write failing tests for Thing.create() that creates a thing with an EntityId URL in the format ns/type/id. Should store the thing with a rowid for efficient relationship lookups.
close_reason: Thing operations tests pass

title: [RED] Relationship.references() finds backlinks
description: Write failing tests for Relationship.references() that finds all things that reference a given thing (backlinks). Should support filtering by relationship type.
close_reason: Relationship operations tests pass

title: [GREEN] Implement Things table with rowid
description: Implement the Things table schema with rowid as primary key. Store EntityId URL components (ns, type, id) with proper indexing. Make all Thing.* tests pass.
close_reason: Things table implemented

title: [GREEN] Implement Relationships table (from_rowid, to_rowid, type)
description: Implement the Relationships table schema with from_rowid and to_rowid foreign keys to Things table, plus relationship type. Make Relationship.relate() and Relationship.unrelate() tests pass.
close_reason: Relationships table and queries implemented

title: [GREEN] Implement graph traversal queries
description: Implement efficient graph traversal queries for Relationship.related() and Relationship.relationships(). Support filtering by type and direction. Make all traversal tests pass.
close_reason: Relationships table and queries implemented

title: [GREEN] Implement backlink queries
description: Implement efficient backlink queries for Relationship.references(). Find all things that reference a given thing via any relationship type. Make backlink tests pass.
close_reason: Relationships table and queries implemented

title: [REFACTOR] Optimize graph queries with indexes
description: Add optimal indexes for graph traversal performance. Analyze query patterns and add composite indexes on Relationships table (from_rowid, type), (to_rowid, type), and any other needed indexes.

title: [REFACTOR] Add batch graph operations
description: Add batch operations for graph mutations: Thing.createMany(), Relationship.relateMany(), etc. Optimize for bulk inserts with transaction batching.

title: [RED] Thing.get() by URL
description: Write failing tests for Thing.get() that retrieves a thing by its full URL. Should return the thing data or null if not found.
close_reason: Thing operations tests pass

title: [RED] Thing.getById() by ns/type/id
description: Write failing tests for Thing.getById() that retrieves a thing by its EntityId components (namespace, type, id). Should return the thing data or null if not found.
close_reason: Thing operations tests pass

title: [RED] Thing.set() upsert
description: Write failing tests for Thing.set() that performs an upsert operation. Should create a new thing if it doesn't exist, or update the existing thing if it does.
close_reason: Thing operations tests pass

title: [RED] Thing.delete() removes thing
description: Write failing tests for Thing.delete() that removes a thing from storage. Should also handle cleanup of any relationships pointing to/from the deleted thing.
close_reason: Thing operations tests pass

title: [RED] Relationship.relate() creates edge with rowid
description: Write failing tests for Relationship.relate() that creates an edge between two things using their rowids. Should support relationship types.
close_reason: Relationship operations tests pass

title: [RED] Relationship.unrelate() removes edge
description: Write failing tests for Relationship.unrelate() that removes an edge between two things. Should handle non-existent relationships gracefully.
close_reason: Relationship operations tests pass

title: [RED] Relationship.related() finds connected things
description: Write failing tests for Relationship.related() that finds all things connected to a given thing. Should support filtering by relationship type and direction.
close_reason: Relationship operations tests pass

title: [RED] Relationship.relationships() lists edges
description: Write failing tests for Relationship.relationships() that lists all edges for a thing. Should return edge metadata including type, direction, and connected thing references.
close_reason: Relationship operations tests pass
